snippet: An Iranian businessman is facing new scrutiny for helping the country with efforts to evade sanctions on its oil sales.
abstract: Iranian businessman Babak Morteza Zanjani is facing new scrutiny for helping the country with efforts to evade sanctions on its oil sales; his rise and now possible fall opens window into secretive, shadowy world of Iranian tycoons who have made their fortunes by helping Iran avoid sanctions intended to thwart its nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: An Iranian businessman is facing new scrutiny for helping the country with efforts to evade sanctions on its oil sales.

headline.main: To This Tycoon, Iran Sanctions Were Like Gold
headline.print_headline: To Iranian Businessman, Sanctions Were Like Gold
